title: Close Out a Project
description: A project is complete. The project manager must perform the final administrative steps to formally close it.

tasks.description: Verify that all deliverables have been completed and handed over to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all project deliverables are complete.

tasks.description: Process the final invoices from all subcontractors and vendors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures all suppliers have been paid.

tasks.description: Generate the final project cost report and a 'lessons learned' document, then formally close the project in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the final reports, archives the project data, and changes the project status to 'Closed'.
